<!-- Based on: https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot/blob/main/prompts/create-readme.prompt.md -->
---
agent: 'agent'
description: 'Create or refresh README.md with clear setup, usage, and contribution guidance.'
---

Review the repository and create or improve `README.md`.

Checklist:
- Explain what the project does and who it is for.
- Add setup/install steps.
- Add usage examples.
- Add development workflow and testing commands.
- Add contribution guidance.
- Keep the structure concise and easy to scan.
